title: Is it possible to get the Odyssey Sona emote on OCE?
body:
I heard that the Odyssey Sona emote was exclusive to content creators. A quick google search showed some small content creators giving away codes but for regions like EU.

I wanted to know is Odyssey Sona emote even available to be obtained in the OCE region? Do we have any content creators who are giving away this emote?

Or are just forgotten and no one can get it here?

replies.body:
Heya Aegis,

A bunch of OCE creators have given away OCE codes across the event (we don't have region-unlocked codes JUST yet). [Loserfruit](https://www.twitch.tv/loserfruit) ran a giveaway on the Saturday just gone when she was streaming Extraction (she was in the client from 4pm â€“ 7pm AEST). But some of the other creators who ran giveaways that I'm aware of are:

[RememberTheBeat](https://www.youtube.com/user/RememberTheBeat)
[Tilterella](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCv2qkByYQkcEbgzXUiPMSqA/featured)
[DiscoHeat](https://www.youtube.com/user/taeHocsiD)
[Ash_on_LoL](https://www.twitch.tv/ash_on_lol)

If you want to know more about exclusive content x regional creators, check out the [League Partner Program](https://partners.leagueoflegends.com/en_AU/).
